Title: COP30: How continental priorities will shape Nigeria’s climate diplomacy
Summary: Experts are seeking a climate diplomacy that reflects Africa's realities and advances Nigeria’s interests, experts say . Expert: Climate diplomacy should reflect Africa's reality and advance Nigeria's interests . Experts seek to find a way to shape Nigeria's climate diplomacy .

Summary: The Royal Institution of Chartered Surveyors (RICS) Nigerian chapter has called for new strategies and policy implementation frameworks . RICS, others seek fresh strategies to tackle nation's housing challenges .

Title: Awujale: Olawunmi warns kingmakers  against violation of traditions, customary law
Summary: Assistant Secretary of the four Ruling Houses of the Awujale, Samuel Olawunmi, has appealed to Ijebu kingmakers . He warns kingmakers against violation of traditions, customary law .

Title: New CNS assumes command, vows to strengthen maritime security
Summary: The newly appointed Chief Naval Staff (CNS), Vice Admiral Idi Abass, has pledging to strengthen maritime security . New CNS assumes command, vows to strengthen Maritime security .

Title: Low retail demand, interest increases plunge consumer credit by 17% to N3.54trn
Summary: Consumer credit to N3.54 trillion in July 2025 from N4.27 trillion as at June 2025 . Decline in retail demand triggered a 17 percent month-on-month (MoM) fall in Consumer credit . Consumer credit was made up of N950 billion .

Title: Furniture makers groan as customers prefer sofa covers to building new ones

Title: FG exceeds 2025 borrowing target by 55.6%
Summary: FG exceeds 2025 borrowing target by 55.6% . Borrows 17.4trn in 10mths, as domestic borrowing escalates . Experts warn of debt crises, crowding out of private sector . Urge FG to cut waste, enforce fiscal discipline .
